parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return the unit position rules.

<br>The return value is always "Auto" unless the unit has gotten a [[setUnitPos]] command. In that case the value is the last stance the unit was ordered to.
<br>Available modes are listed at [[setUnitPos]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''unitPos''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] [[unitPos]] _unit;</code>

</value></part><part><name>mp </name>=<value> Unit pos set by [[setUnitPosWeak]] is not returned for remote (non-local) units.

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setUnitPos]], [[setUnitPosWeak]], [[stance]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
